trans-unit.source: Allows security actions for <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission"></xref> to be applied to code using declarative security.
trans-unit.target: Tillater Sikkerhetshandlinger for <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission"> </xref> som skal brukes til å bruke deklarerende sikkerhet-kode.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: The scope of the declaration that is allowed depends on the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction> that is used.
trans-unit.target: Avhengig av omfanget deklarasjonen som er tillatt i <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>som brukes.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>

trans-unit.source: The properties <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermissionAttribute.CertFile%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermissionAttribute.SignedFile%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermissionAttribute.X509Certificate%2A> are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermissionAttribute.CertFile%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermissionAttribute.SignedFile%2A>, og <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermissionAttribute.X509Certificate%2A>utelukker hverandre.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermissionAttribute.X509Certificate%2A> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermissionAttribute.SignedFile%2A> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermissionAttribute.CertFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time.
trans-unit.target: Sikkerhetsinformasjonen deklarert av et sikkerhetsattributt med er lagret i metadataene for attributtet, og brukes under kjøring av systemet.

trans-unit.source: Security attributes are used only for declarative security.
trans-unit.target: Av sikkerhetsattributter brukes bare for deklarerende sikkerhet.

trans-unit.source: For imperative security, use the corresponding permission class.
trans-unit.target: For viktig sikkerhet, kan du bruke den tilsvarende tillatelse-klassen.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], identity permissions are not used.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Med start av [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], ID-tillatelser er ikke brukt.

trans-unit.source: > > In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> permission state value.
trans-unit.target: >> I .NET Framework-versjon 1.0 og 1.1 Identitetstillatelser kan ikke ha en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>tillatelse tilstandsverdi.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, identity permissions can have any permission state value.
trans-unit.target: Starter med .NET Framework, versjon 2.0, kan Identitetstillatelser ha tillatelse tilstand verdier.

trans-unit.source: This means that in 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission> interface.
trans-unit.target: Dette betyr at i 2.0 eller senere versjoner Identitetstillatelser har på samme måte som tillatelser som implementerer den <xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > By default, code access security does not check for <xref:System.Security.Policy.Publisher> evidence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Som standard kontrollerer ikke kodetilgangssikkerhet <xref:System.Security.Policy.Publisher>bevis.</xref:System.Security.Policy.Publisher>

trans-unit.source: Unless your computer has a custom code group based on the <xref:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition> class, you can improve performance by bypassing Authenticode signature verification.
trans-unit.target: Hvis datamaskinen din har en egendefinert kodegruppe basert på den <xref:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition>klasse, du kan forbedre ytelsen ved å omgå Authenticode signaturbekreftelse.</xref:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition>

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by configuring the runtime to not provide <xref:System.Security.Policy.Publisher> evidence for code access security.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjøres ved å konfigurere kjøretiden til ikke å oppgi <xref:System.Security.Policy.Publisher>bevis for kodetilgangssikkerhet.</xref:System.Security.Policy.Publisher>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to configure this option and which applications can use it, see the element.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om hvordan du konfigurerer dette alternativet, og hvilke kan programmer bruke den, kan du se elementet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermissionAttribute"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermissionAttribute"> </xref> klassen med den angitte <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a certification file containing an Authenticode X.509v3 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en sertifisering-fil som inneholder en Authenticode X.509v3-sertifikat.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermissionAttribute.X509Certificate%2A> is set, this property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermissionAttribute.X509Certificate%2A>er angitt, ignoreres denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermissionAttribute.X509Certificate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The file path of an X.509 certificate file (usually has the extension.cer).
trans-unit.target: Filbanen for en X.509 sertifikatfilen (vanligvis har extension.cer).

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new instance of <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter og returnerer en ny forekomst av <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method should be called only by the security system, never by application code.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden må kalles bare av sikkerhetssystemer, aldri av programmet kode.

trans-unit.source: At compile time, attributes convert security declarations to a serialized form in metadata.
trans-unit.target: På kompileringstidspunktet konvertere attributter sikkerhet deklareringer til en serialisert form i metadataene.

trans-unit.source: Declarative security data in metadata is created from the permission that this method returns that corresponds to this attribute.
trans-unit.target: Deklarerende sikkerhetsdata i metadataene er opprettet fra tillatelsen som returnerer denne metoden som samsvarer med attributtet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission"></xref> that corresponds to this attribute.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission"> </xref> som samsvarer med attributtet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a signed file from which to extract an Authenticode X.509v3 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en signert fil som ikke trekke ut en Authenticode X.509v3-sertifikat.

trans-unit.source: If either <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermissionAttribute.X509Certificate%2A> or <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermissionAttribute.CertFile%2A> is set, this property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermissionAttribute.X509Certificate%2A>eller <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermissionAttribute.CertFile%2A>er angitt, ignoreres denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermissionAttribute.CertFile%2A> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermissionAttribute.X509Certificate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The file path of a file signed with the Authenticode signature.
trans-unit.target: Filbanen til en fil som er signert med Authenticode-signaturen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an Authenticode X.509v3 certificate that identifies the publisher of the calling code.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et Authenticode X.509v3-sertifikat som identifiserer utgiveren av kall koden.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermissionAttribute.CertFile%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermissionAttribute.SignedFile%2A> are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen er angitt, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermissionAttribute.CertFile%2A>og <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermissionAttribute.SignedFile%2A>ignoreres.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermissionAttribute.SignedFile%2A> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermissionAttribute.CertFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can obtain the hexadecimal representation by running the Strong Name tool (Sn.exe) with the token and public key options (**Sn** **-tp** *keyfile*`)` against a file that has an Authenticode signature.
trans-unit.target: Du finner den heksadesimale representasjonen ved å kjøre verktøyet sterkt navn (Sn.exe) med token- og offentlig key (**etter serienummer elle** **- tp** *keyfile* `)` mot en fil som har en Authenticode-signaturen.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Sn.exe (Strong Name Tool)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Sn.exe (sterke navnet verktøyet)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A hexadecimal representation of the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: En heksadesimale representasjon av X.509-sertifikatet.
